_meta.note: Pressure = force per area. Boundary of self meets world through mechanical contact.

_holographic_seed.absolute: ‚äô = untouched. Pressure = apparent contact in dream of separation.
_holographic_seed.essence: Force distributed over surface. Where body meets not-body.
_holographic_seed.paths: Resistance defines boundary. Push back = mutual arising.
_holographic_seed.positions: 0D point force ‚Üí 2D surface field ‚Üí 3D volume compression ‚Üí boundary dynamics
_holographic_seed.fibonacci: Touch develops: reflex ‚Üí grasping ‚Üí exploration ‚Üí mastery (œÜ-paced)
_holographic_seed.tools: Mechanoreceptors measure boundary tension. Skin = interface.
_holographic_seed.note: This file contains force embodiment from felt-contact angle

name: Pressure
essence: Force per unit area. Mechanical contact made perceptible through skin.
description: Pressure measures force distributed over surface. P = F/A. Felt through mechanoreceptors when something pushes against skin. Boundary phenomenon: where self meets world through resistance. Atmospheric pressure weighs constantly but unfelt (balanced inside). Touch, squeeze, vibration, texture ‚Äî all pressure variations.

direct_pointing.look: Press fingertip against table. Feel resistance.
direct_pointing.trace: That sensation = pressure. Force distributed over contact area.
direct_pointing.recognize: Boundary revealed. You pushing table. Table pushing you. Mutual.
direct_pointing.rest: ‚äô = untouched. Pressure arises when separation seems to occur.

practice.boundary_sensing: Touch wall gently. Increase pressure gradually. Notice: harder push = stronger push back. Newton's third law felt.
practice.atmospheric_weight: 10 tons per square meter pressing you constantly. Why unfelt? Balanced inside. Pressure only sensed at differences.
practice.texture_exploration: Run fingers over rough surface. Tiny pressure variations = texture. Movement essential for perception.
practice.vibration_awareness: Hold vibrating phone. Low frequency oscillating pressure. Pacinian corpuscles firing.

recognition.pressure_is_mutual: You push world. World pushes back. Simultaneous arising.
recognition.boundary_defined: Pressure reveals where you end and world begins
recognition.resistance_confirms: Feeling pressure = knowing something solid exists
recognition.adaptation_blindness: Constant pressure fades. Only changes sensed (clothes unfelt).

fundamental_law.implication: Same force over smaller area = higher pressure (needle vs. hand)

psi.definition: Pounds per square inch. 1 psi ‚âà 6,895 Pa

static.examples: Weight on surface, atmospheric pressure, hydraulic press

dynamic.examples: Wind pressure, water jet, blood flow
dynamic.bernoulli: Static + dynamic + gravitational pressure = constant (along streamline)

oscillating.perception: Vibration, buzzing, rumble felt on skin

atmospheric_pressure.weight: ~10 metric tons per square meter on Earth surface
atmospheric_pressure.unfelt: Equal pressure inside body balances outside. No net force.

weather.gradient: Drives wind from high to low

space.consequence: Body fluids boil, lungs rupture without pressure suit

hydrostatic_pressure.definition: Pressure from fluid weight: P = œÅgh

water.crushing: Unprotected human body compressed at depth

blood_pressure.hydrostatic_variation: Standing vs. lying changes pressure (gravity effect)

compression.ideal_gas: PV = nRT (pressure √ó volume = constant at fixed T)
compression.examples: Gas cylinder, diving suit compressed at depth

barotrauma.bends: Rapid decompression ‚Üí nitrogen bubbles in blood (fatal)
barotrauma.prevention: Equalize pressure: yawn, swallow, slow ascent/descent

boiling_point.application: Pressure cookers (higher pressure ‚Üí higher boiling point)

adaptation.fast_adapting: Respond to changes only. Ignore steady pressure.
adaptation.benefit: Detect changes while ignoring constant background (clothes unfelt)
adaptation.example: Watch on wrist unfelt after minutes. Movement makes it noticeable again.

two_point_discrimination.definition: Minimum distance between two points felt as separate

sources.artificial: Phone vibration, massage devices, speakers, motors

transmission.solid: Vibration travels through objects to skin

sound_crossover.ear_vs_skin: Ear detects 20-20,000 Hz. Skin detects 0.1-1000 Hz.

texture.definition: Spatial pattern of pressure variations across surface

properties.roughness: Amplitude and frequency of surface irregularities
properties.temperature: Often confounded with texture (metal feels colder)

active_touch.fingertip_scanning: Tiny pressure variations detected during motion

vacuum.consequences: Boiling, expansion, no sound transmission (no medium)

records.highest: Shock waves in lab (TPa = 10¬π¬≤ Pa, transient)

danger.numbness: Ignoring pressure signals. Tissue damage (bedsores from sustained pressure).
danger.overpressure: Barotrauma. Eardrum rupture. The bends. Lung damage.
danger.boundary_violation: Excessive pressure breaks skin integrity. Pain threshold exceeded.

balance.internal_external: Body pressure balanced with atmospheric. Homeostasis.
balance.push_resist: Action = reaction. Mutual arising of forces.
balance.sensitivity_adaptation: Acute sensing vs. ignoring constant. Both necessary.

deepening: Notice: every touch = pressure. Force at boundary.
Recognize: pressure mutual. You push world, world pushes you simultaneously.
Understand: 10 tons atmospheric weight unfelt (balanced inside). Only differences sensed.
See: texture = pressure pattern. Vibration = oscillating pressure. Sound = pressure wave.
Realize: boundary defined by resistance. Self/world distinction appears through pressure.

infinity.sensitivity_spectrum: From feather touch (millinewtons) to crushing force (kilonewtons).
infinity.temporal_resolution: Detect vibrations 0.1-1000 Hz. Vast frequency range.
infinity.pointer: Pressure = apparent force at apparent boundary. ‚äô knows no resistance.

fractal_property.self_similar: Molecule collides ‚Üí cells pressed together ‚Üí tissue compressed ‚Üí organ pressure ‚Üí body weight ‚Üí planetary atmosphere ‚Üí gravitational pressure in stars
fractal_property.contains_whole: Pressure embeds force, boundary, resistance, mutual arising
fractal_property.example: Fingertip on table = Earth pressing into sun. Same dynamics, different scale.

metaphor.psychological: Feeling pressured. Social pressure. Peer pressure. Time pressure.
metaphor.social: Pressure to conform. Pushing boundaries. Resistance movements.
metaphor.spiritual: Pressure = resistance to what is. Surrender = releasing pressure.
metaphor.existential: Life's weight. Carrying burdens. Being pressed.

the_hut_perspective.legs_experience: Body feels pressure. Touch, squeeze, weight, pain from excess.
the_hut_perspective.hut_recognition: ‚äô = untouched. Pressure sensations arise in awareness but awareness experiences no pressure.
the_hut_perspective.integration: Let body sense pressure naturally. Boundary intelligence operates automatically. You are not the boundary ‚Äî you are spaceless awareness where boundary appears.
the_hut_perspective.practice: Press hands together firmly. Notice sensation. Now notice: what is aware of pressure? That has no boundary, no resistance, no pressure.

aiur_integration.planetary_pressure: Atmospheric pressure = planetary body pressing on surface. Unified field.
aiur_integration.tectonic: Continental plates pressing. Earthquakes = pressure release.
aiur_integration.oceanic: Water weight creates hydrostatic pressure gradient. Life adapted to pressure zones.
aiur_integration.awakening: When neurons feel planetary pressure as one body, Aiur knows its own weight.

cfo_axioms.point_entity_absolute: Pressure = 0D scalar or 2D field across surface
cfo_axioms.sacred_coherence: Uniform pressure = equilibrium = coherence. Gradients = flow drivers.

applications.medicine: Blood pressure monitoring, compression therapy, wound care
applications.diving: Decompression tables, pressure suits, hyperbaric chambers

koans.atmospheric_weight: 10 tons pressing you always. Why unfelt? ‚Äî Balanced inside. Only differences sensed.
koans.mutual_arising: You push table. Table pushes you. Which came first? ‚Äî Neither. Simultaneous.
koans.phantom_touch: Amputee feels pressure on missing hand. Where is sensation? ‚Äî In brain's body map, not space.
koans.clothes_unfelt: Why do clothes disappear after minutes? ‚Äî Fast-adapting receptors. Constant ignored, changes noticed.
koans.awareness_pressure: What pressure does awareness feel? ‚Äî ‚äô None. Untouched.

final_transmission.pointer: Every pressure felt = boundary appearing in boundless awareness.
final_transmission.recognition: Resistance reveals apparent separation. Push = mutual arising of force.
final_transmission.completion: The hut knows no pressure. Let legs sense contact freely. ‚äô

external.citation: Kandel, E. R., et al. (2013). Principles of Neural Science (5th ed.). McGraw-Hill.
Johnson, K. O. (2001). The roles and functions of cutaneous mechanoreceptors. Current Opinion in Neurobiology.

blessing: May you sense pressure at boundary without identifying as boundary. May your body's mechanoreceptors report contact faithfully. May you rest as untouched awareness while legs feel the world's touch. üñ§‚äô
